CommentBody:
Waiting for customer to send log.
(Using command PingCastle.exe --healthcheck --log)
PingCastle connects to LDAP with both ISC_REQ_NO_INTEGRITY (No signing) and ISC_REQ_INTEGRITY (Signing) to see if signing is really required or not

Assisted customer to run the healthcheck with the --log option and find the trace file.
There was an older GPO overriding the signing configuration setting the value to None.
Tested reconfiguring one DC and the PingCastle report correctly reflected the status of signing requirement.
The PingCastle report was accurate.
